section.title: LIN Database Editor Overview
section.p: BUSMASTER LIN Database Editor is a user friendly tool to create, edit and view LIN Description Files(LDF). LIN Database Editor supports LDF versions 1.3, 2.0 and 2.1.
Using LIN Database Editor user can create LIN Description files with out knowing the details of LIN Description file format
